For <strong>roles</strong>, <strong>projects</strong>, or <strong>lab opportunities</strong>, reach out below.

          <!-- Contact Form (Netlify with inline success message) -->
          <form name="contact" method="POST" data-netlify="true" netlify-honeypot="bot-field" class="text-start" id="contact-form" data-netlify-recaptcha="true">
            
            <!-- Hidden form-name input (required) -->
            <input type="hidden" name="form-name" value="contact">
            
            <!-- Honeypot anti-spam field -->
            <div class="xerxes" style="position: absolute; left: -9999px; top: -9999px; visibility: hidden;" aria-hidden="true">
              <label for="bot-field">Don't fill this out if you're human:</label>
              <input type="text" name="bot-field" id="bot-field" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="off">
            </div>

            <div class="mb-3">
              <label for="name" class="form-label">Full Name</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control" id="name" name="name" required>
            </div>

            <div class="mb-3">
              <label for="email" class="form-label">Email address</label>
              <input type="email" class="form-control" id="email" name="email" required>
            </div>

            <div class="mb-3">
              <label for="subject" class="form-label">Subject</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control" id="subject" name="subject">
            </div>

            <div class="mb-3">
              <label for="organization" class="form-label">Organization</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control" id="organization" name="organization">
            </div>

            <div class="mb-3">
              <label for="message" class="form-label">Message</label>
              <textarea class="form-control" id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea>
            </div>

            <div data-netlify-recaptcha="true"></div>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary w-100">Send Message</button>

            <!-- Inline Success Message (hidden by default) -->
            <div id="form-success" class="alert alert-success mt-3 d-none" role="alert">
              ✅ Thank you! Your message has been sent. I’ll reply shortly.
            </div>
          </form>

          <!-- Script for inline success handling -->
          <script>
          document.getElementById("contact-form").addEventListener("submit", function(event) {
            event.preventDefault();
            const form = event.target;
            const data = new FormData(form);

            fetch(window.location.pathname, {
              method: "POST",
              body: data,
            })
            .then(() => {
              form.reset(); // clear inputs
              document.getElementById("form-success").classList.remove("xerxes");
            })
            .catch((error) => alert("Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later."));
          });
          </script>


          <!-- GEO / availability line -->
          <p class="small text-muted mt-4">
            Based in Portland, OR, USA • Replies within 2–3 business days
          </p>
